Package fragment

Class GameFragment

java.lang.Object
fragment.Fragment
fragment.GameFragment
public class GameFragment
extends Fragment
This fragment is used to display the current score of the players

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Label playerOneScoreLabel
    The label used to display the score of player one
    protected Label playerTwoScoreLabel
    The label used to display the score of player two
    protected java.awt.Color scoreBaseColour
    The color to be used when the score effect is not running
    protected java.awt.Color scoreEffectColour
    The color to be used during the score effect
    protected int scoreEffectTransitionTime
    The amount of time that must pass before the score effect resets

    Fields inherited from class fragment.Fragment

    active, components, gameInstance

    Calculates the color to use for the score label based on how long ago the player scored a point.
    void update​(double dt)
    Update the fragment by updating the score labels and changing the colour of the label when a player recently scored.

    • getScoreColour

      private java.awt.Color getScoreColour​(double elapsed)
      Calculates the color to use for the score label based on how long ago the player scored a point.
      Parameters:
      elapsed - Amount of time since the player last scored
      Returns:
      Returns the color to be used

    • update

      public void update​(double dt)
      Update the fragment by updating the score labels and changing the colour of the label when a player recently scored.
      Overrides:
      update in class Fragment
      Parameters:
      dt - Time passed since last update

    • fadeColorComponent

      private int fadeColorComponent​(int comp1, int comp2, double ratio)
      Given two colour components, comp1 and comp2, find a mix between the two based on the ratio. If ratio is 0, then the color returned will be all comp1. If ratio is 1, then the returned color will be entirely made up of comp2.
      Parameters:
      comp1 - First colour component to mix
      comp2 - Second colour component to mix
      ratio - Double between 0-1 representing the mix of the colours
      Returns:
      Returns the colour calculated
